Popover.name: isDismissable
Popover.description: Whether to close the overlay when the user interacts outside it.

Popover.name: isKeyboardDismissDisabled
Popover.description: Whether pressing the escape key to close the popover should be disabled.

Popover.name: isOpen
Popover.description: Whether the popover is currently open.

Popover.name: onClose
Popover.description: Handler that is called when the popover should close.

Popover.name: shouldCloseOnBlur
Popover.description: Whether the overlay should close when focus is lost or moves outside it.

Popover.name: shouldCloseOnInteractOutside
Popover.description:
When user interacts with the argument element outside of the overlay ref,
return true if onClose should be called.  This gives you a chance to filter
out interaction with elements that should not dismiss the overlay.
By default, onClose will always be called on interaction outside the overlay ref.

PopoverTrigger.name: defaultOpen
PopoverTrigger.description: Whether the popover is open by default (uncontrolled).

PopoverTrigger.name: isOpen
PopoverTrigger.description: Whether the popover is open by default (controlled).

PopoverTrigger.name: maxHeight
PopoverTrigger.description:
The maxHeight specified for the popover element.

By default, it will take all space up to the current viewport height.

PopoverTrigger.name: offset
PopoverTrigger.description:
The additional offset applied along the main axis between the element and its
anchor element.

PopoverTrigger.name: onOpenChange
PopoverTrigger.description: Handler that is called when the popover's open state changes.

PopoverTrigger.name: placement
PopoverTrigger.description: The placement of the element with respect to its anchor element.

PopoverTrigger.name: scrollRef
PopoverTrigger.description: A ref for the scrollable region within the popover.

PopoverTrigger.name: shouldFlip
PopoverTrigger.description:
Whether the element should flip its orientation (e.g. top to bottom or left to right) when
there is insufficient room for it to render completely.

PopoverTrigger.name: shouldUpdatePosition
PopoverTrigger.description: Whether the popover should update its position automatically.

PopoverTrigger.name: type
PopoverTrigger.description: Type of popover that is opened by the trigger.

PopoverTriggerState.name: defaultOpen
PopoverTriggerState.description: Whether the popover is open by default (uncontrolled).

PopoverTriggerState.name: isOpen
PopoverTriggerState.description: Whether the popover is open by default (controlled).

PopoverTriggerState.name: onOpenChange
PopoverTriggerState.description: Handler that is called when the popover's open state changes.
